result.purpose: Responsible for defining HTTP client configurations, handlers, middleware, and server setup for web applications.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, organizing files by their responsibilities in handling HTTP requests, responses, and server management.

pkg/http/client.go.purpose: Defines HTTP client configuration and error handling for making HTTP requests.

pkg/http/client_params.go.purpose: Defines parameters and authentication methods for HTTP requests using the Resty library.

pkg/http/handler.go.purpose: Defines HTTP handlers and routing setup for a web application using Echo framework.

pkg/http/metrics.go.purpose: This file provides metrics for HTTP client performance using Prometheus.

pkg/http/middlewares.go.purpose: Defines middleware for handling errors in HTTP requests using Echo framework.

pkg/http/server.go.purpose: Defines an HTTP server with middleware support and health check functionality.

pkg/http/tracer.go.purpose: This file implements tracing for HTTP connections to monitor their lifecycle and performance metrics.
